00002 /// @file         CPuzzleGraph.h

00010 /// @description  This file contains the declaration of the CPuzzleGraph class,
00011 ///               which stores the actual data of a puzzle, and the structures
00012 ///               which represent the puzzle nodes and spans.
00013 ///
00014 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00015 #ifndef _CPUZZLE_H_
00016 #define _CPUZZLE_H_
00017 
00018 #include <QString>
00019 #include <QList>
00020 #include <QPoint>
00021 #include <QDataStream>
00022 
00023 struct SPuzzleNode;
00024 struct SPuzzleSpan;
00025 
00026 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00027 /// CPuzzleGraph
00028 ///
00029 /// @description  The CPuzzleGraph class is a container for the Nodes and Spans
00030 ///               in a puzzle graph. It provides a complete and unsecured access
00031 ///               to its attributes.
00032 ///               The CPuzzleGraph also encapsulates its own file I/O for both
00033 ///               saving and loading. For image output of the graph layout see
00034 ///               the CPuzzleGraphRenderer.
00035 ///
00036 /// @limitations  Direct use of this class can be very dangerous. For speed
00037 ///               optimization the two lists have been made accesible by
00038 ///               reference. Since they are both pointer lists, there exists
00039 ///               both the danger of deleting them without removing them from
00040 ///               the list and vice versa. It is recommended that this class be
00041 ///               placed inside a CPuzzleGraphModel before interacting with it.
00042 ///
00043 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00044 class CPuzzleGraph
00045 {
00046 public:
00047     CPuzzleGraph();
00048     ~CPuzzleGraph();
00049 
00050     QString getFileName();
00051     QList<SPuzzleNode *> &getNodeList();
00052     QList<SPuzzleSpan *> &getSpanList();
00053     SPuzzleNode * getStartNode() const;
00054 
00055     void load( const QString &fileName = QString() );
00056     void save( const QString &fileName = QString() );
00057 
00058     void setFileName( const QString &fileName );
00059     void setStartNode(SPuzzleNode *node);
00060 
00061 private:
00062     QList<SPuzzleNode *> m_nodeList;
00063     QList<SPuzzleSpan *> m_spanList;
00064 
00065     SPuzzleNode *m_startNode;
00066 
00067     QString m_fileName;
00068 };
00069 
00070 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00071 /// SPuzzleNode
00072 ///
00073 /// @description  The SPuzzleNode struct publicly contains all the information
00074 ///               needed to define a node in a puzzle graph.
00075 ///
00076 /// @limitations  None
00077 ///
00078 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00079 struct SPuzzleNode
00080 {
00081     SPuzzleNode();
00082     ~SPuzzleNode();
00083 
00084     enum NodeFlag
00085     {
00086         MidNode     = 0x0000,   //0000
00087         StartNode   = 0x0001,   //0001
00088         EndNode     = 0x0002    //0010
00089     };
00090 
00091     QString                 s_name;
00092  qreal                   s_heuristic;
00093     QPoint                  s_position;
00094     NodeFlag                s_flag;
00095     QList<SPuzzleSpan *>    s_spanList;
00096 };
00097 
00098 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00099 /// SPuzzleSpan
00100 ///
00101 /// @description  The SPuzzleSpan struct publicly contains all the information
00102 ///               needed to define all possible link combinations between two
00103 ///               nodes in a puzzle graph.
00104 ///
00105 /// @limitations  None
00106 ///
00107 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00108 struct SPuzzleSpan
00109 {
00110     SPuzzleSpan();
00111     SPuzzleSpan( SPuzzleNode* node1, SPuzzleNode* node2 );
00112     ~SPuzzleSpan();
00113 
00114     enum SpanFlag
00115     {
00116         EmptySpan       = 0x0000,                   //0000
00117         From1           = 0x0001,                   //0001
00118         From2           = 0x0002,                   //0010
00119         To1             = From2,                    //0010
00120         To2             = From1,                    //0001
00121         Bidirectional   = 0x0004 | From1 | From2,   //0111
00122         Split           = From1 | From2             //0011
00123     };
00124 
00125     SPuzzleNode    *s_node1;
00126     SPuzzleNode    *s_node2;
00127     qreal           s_weightFrom1;
00128     qreal           s_weightFrom2;
00129     SpanFlag        s_flag;
00130 };
00131 
00132 #endif /*_CPUZZLE_H_*/
